amendment.description: An amendment numbered 74 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to reduce the authorization levels in sections 101, 103, and 1111.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the authorization levels for airport planning and development, operations, and Federal Aviation Administration research and development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 52 - 381 (Roll no. 359).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Perry.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 52 - 381 (Roll no. 359).
